SELECT apt_seq, sgg_cd, umd_cd, umd_nm, jibun, road_um_sgg_cd, road_nm, road_nm_bonbun, road_nm_bubun, apt_nm, build_year, latitude, longitude, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM house_deal WHERE house_deal.apt_seq = house_info.apt_seq) AS deal_cnt, (SELECT FORMAT(ROUND(AVG(CAST(REPLACE(deal_amount, ',', '') AS DOUBLE)), 1), 0) FROM house_deal WHERE house_deal.apt_seq = house_info.apt_seq) AS avg_deal_amount FROM house_info WHERE CONCAT(sgg_cd, umd_cd) = #{dongCode}
AND apt_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
